names.pinyin: zi yin chu shi tang yi hao

actions: Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and stops pain due to Blood Stasis.
Nourishes the Blood and astringes Yin.
With Dang Gui, nourishes Yin and Blood.
With Gan Cao, for muscle spasms, pain and numbness, especially in the calf, due to Blood Deficiency.
With Dang Gui and Shu Di Huang, for dizziness and blurred vision due to Blood Deficiency.
Harmonizes the Exterior and Interior and disperses Wind-Heat.
With Bai Shao, for Liver Blood Deficiency with Liver Qi Stagnation.
With Gan Cao, for Wind-Heat fever.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, drains Fire, detoxifies and cools the Blood.
With Chai Hu, for Heat in the Shao Yang with alternating chills and fever and nausea.
With Bai Shao, cools and nourishes the Blood.
Nourishes the Blood and nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin.
With Dang Gui, for Blood Deficiency marked by dizziness, palpitations, insomnia and menstrual dysfunction.
Cools the Blood, drains Yin Deficiency Fire and clears and drains Heat in the Lung.
With Huang Qin, for Blood Deficiency Heat.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Stasis, Promotes urination, reduces swelling, clears Heat and resolves toxicity.
Clears Heat, drains Fire, nourishes Yin, moistens Dryness, generates Fluids, clears Deficiency Fire and quenches thirst.
With Huang Qin, for Cough with Excess Lung Heat.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness and drains Kidney Fire.
Releases the Exterior, expels External Wind, expels Wind-Dampness and alleviates pain.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood and Jing and expels Wind from the skin by nourishing the Blood.
Moistens the Lungs, clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
Nourishes Yin
Dries Dampness
Nourishes the Blood
Alleviates itching
syndromes: Blood Dryness due to Yin Deficiency with Dampness

symptoms: Long-lasting and recurrent itchy patches with small vesicles
The lesions are dull red or dirty gray
The skin is rough, infiltrated or lichenified with scratch marks
Red eruptions around the edge of patches
Crusting or scaling, or small amounts of exudation
Skin lesions spread out all over the body
Difficulty in falling asleep because of the intense itching
manifestations.pulse: Thready and rapid or Thready and slippery or Wiry and thready
